1.text: The earth cooled down. The earth cooled down and hardened. The earth hardened. Early humans hunted. Early humans hunted and gathered food. They gathered food. 5.text: 1. Early people lived in caves. They painted pictures on the walls.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> Early <break time='200ms'/> people <break time='200ms'/> lived <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> caves. <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> painted <break time='200ms'/> pictures <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> walls. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: 2. Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876. It was very different from the phones we use today.

7.text: 3. In the Stone Age people didn't build houses. They did not use metal tools.
